_source.text: 05/23/2012 , The PlayStation Network (better known as the PSN for short) will be entering its scheduled maintenance from tomorrow onwards - that is, Thursday, the 24th of May for those who have completely lost track of time simply because you spent way too much...

text: completely lost track of **time** simply **because** you **spent** way too much...
